channel.title: Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.12. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-419 7z entry with LZMA2 compression. Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.Saving.SevenZipLZMA2CompressionSettings Settings for LZMA2 compression method within the 7z archive. Aspose.Zip.Saving.SevenZipLZMA2CompressionSettings.DictionarySize Dictionary (history buffer) size indicates how many bytes of the recently processed uncompressed data is kept in memory.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.10. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-374 7z archive composition implemented with LZMA compression Enhancement ZIPNET-415 Reintroduce version for .NET Standard 2.0 Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.Saving.SevenZipAESEncryptionSettings Settings for AES encryption.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.9. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-374 7z archive composition implemented with LZMA compression Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.Saving.SevenZipAESEncryptionSettings Settings for AES encryption. Aspose.Zip.SevenZip.SevenZipArchive Class for 7z archive representation.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.8. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-356 Support of retrieving gzip archive name. Enhancement ZIPNET-392 Extraction of a huge archive may fail. Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public methods and properties were added: Description Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.6.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.6.1. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-344 Drop Mono.Posix dependency for NETStandard. Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes None.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.6. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-242 Implement LZMA compression within ZIP archive Enhancement ZIPNET-345 Implement BZip2 compression within ZIP archive Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.Saving.Bzip2CompressionSettings Represents settings for Bzip2 compression within ZIP archive.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.3. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-240 Implement bzip2 compression Enhancement ZIPNET-300 Compress directory with trailing slash Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.Bzip2.Bzip2Archive Represents the bzip2 archive file. Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for .NET 19.1. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-296 Implement Unix Standard TAR archive Enhancement ZIPNET-297 Implement GZIP archive Enhancement ZIPNET-251 Path Traversal Vulnerability Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.
